import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import keys from "../../config/keys"; import { Card, CardTitle, CardBody } from "@progress/kendo-react-layout"; import "../pages.css"; import Cpp from "../images/cpp.png"; const Skill = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const url = keys.backendURI + "/api/skills"; const fetchData = async () => { const result = await axios(url); setData(result.data); // console.log(data.data[1]); }; fetchData(); }, []); if (!data.data) return null; // // empty render until we get data console.log(data.data[0]); // if we get data we do have education details return (

); }; export default Skill;
